helpgrid.innerhtml: Bill lines can be added to bill batches automatically with the price schedule billing cron task, or they can be copied manually. To manually copy all work order, ticket, and sales order transactions to the active bill batch, click Copy WOs, Tickets, and SOs. This action also copies transactions that were added since the bill batch became active. You can also select individual or multiple work orders, tickets, or sales orders and copy them to the bill batch.

dialog.label: Advance all WAPPR Lines to APPR

helpgrid.innerhtml: All Lines in this Batch that are in WAPPR status will be advanced to APPR Status.
When the bill line status changes from on hold or disputed to waiting approval or approved, all original and updated work order transactions are copied to the active bill batch.

dialog.label: View Current Bill Batch Progress
dialog.whereclause: lastcopystatus in (select value from synonymdomain where domainid='PLUSPBBCOPYSTATUS' and maxvalue='INPROGRESS')

statictext.label: Bill lines are being copied to a bill batch in the background. When the copying is complete, a notification will be sent to the email address in the Email field.

helpgrid.innerhtml: Specify the customer PO and customer cost center that you want to update for all work orders, tickets, and sales orders that are related to each bill batch line.
